Create a image from movie using AV Foundation API

 1 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
 2 #import <AVFoundation/AVFoundation.h>
 3 #import <ImageIO/ImageIO.h>
 4 #import <CoreServices/CoreServices.h>
 5 
 6 int main(int argc, const char ** argv) {
 7     @autoreleasepool {
 8         AVAsset *asset = [AVAsset assetWithURL:[NSURL URLWithString:@"file:///path/to/movie.mov"]];
 9         AVAssetImageGenerator *ig = [AVAssetImageGenerator assetImageGeneratorWithAsset:asset];
10         Float64 duration = CMTimeGetSeconds([asset duration]);
11         CMTime midpoint = CMTimeMakeWithSeconds(duration/2.0, 600);
12         NSError *err;
13         CMTime actualTime;
14         
15         CGImageRef img = [ig copyCGImageAtTime: midpoint actualTime:&actualTime error:&err];
16         
17         NSString *path = [@"~/Desktop/test.png" stringByExpandingTildeInPath];
18         NSLog(@"path: %@", path);
19         CFURLRef url = (__bridge CFURLRef) [NSURL fileURLWithPath:path];
20         
21         CGImageDestinationRef dest = CGImageDestinationCreateWithURL(url, kUTTypePNG, 1, NULL);
22         if (!dest) {
23             NSLog(@"Failed to create CGImageDestination for %@", path);
24             return -1;
25         }
26         
27         CGImageDestinationAddImage(dest, img, nil);
28         if (!CGImageDestinationFinalize(dest)) {
29             NSLog(@"Failed to write image to %@", path);
30             CFRelease(dest);
31             return -1;
32         }
33         
34         CFRelease(dest);
35     }
36     return 0;
37 }
